name: Help Me Blacksmith
description:
This game was made in roughly 30 hours for the Global Game Jam 2020, where the theme was Repair.

The idea of the game is that customers will visit the blacksmith to get various weapons repaired, and each customer has different requirements for their weapon. Your job is to select the right part from two randomly picked options for each part of the weapon, and aim to build the right weapon for the job.

The game itself was made in Unreal Engine using Blueprints, and the models were made in Maya and textured with Photoshop. All sound effects were made using FMOD.

Credits:

  • Developer/Programmer: Diermas
  • Artist/Modeller: Equi Bot
  • Sound/Music: Stuart Cunningham
